Pattern #19. "Packet - Packet Component" Pattern // aggregate patterns

Typical object interactions

- disassemble --> create

- assemble --> getValue

Examples

- record-field, message-token, telemetry packet - telemetry component

Combinations

- When a "packet component" is treated as a specific item:

Pattern #5. "Specific Item - Transaction"

Pattern #10. "Specific Item - Line Item"

Pattern #11. "Item - Specific Item."

Aggregate patterns

Patterns for building object models
